trans-unit.source: Manages the subscriptions of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> to the owner activities.
trans-unit.target: Gerencia as assinaturas da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> para as atividades do proprietário.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> class using the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> usando o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that owns the correlation token.
trans-unit.target: O nome da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que possui o token de correlação.

trans-unit.source: A collection of property values in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de valores de propriedade no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Fires correlation initialized events.
trans-unit.target: Dispara eventos inicializados por correlação.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> was already initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> já foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> é inicializado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> is initialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> for inicializada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To initialize the correlation token, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken.Initialize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para inicializar o token de correlação, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken.Initialize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates accessing the Initialized property of a correlation token object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como acessar a propriedade inicializado de um objeto de token de correlação.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationProperty" /> .

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates accessing the Properties property of a correlation token object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como acessar a propriedade de propriedades de um objeto de token de correlação.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that owns the correlation token.
trans-unit.target: O nome da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que possui o token de correlação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationTokenEventArgs" /> that is listening for a change in event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationTokenEventArgs" /> que está escutando em busca de uma alteração nos dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Subscribes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> to the initialized event.
trans-unit.target: Assina o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> no evento inicializado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> or <paramref name="dataChangeListener" /> are null references (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> ou <paramref name="dataChangeListener" /> são referências nulas (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that owns the correlation token.
trans-unit.target: O nome da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que possui o token de correlação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationTokenEventArgs" /> that is listening for a change in event data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationTokenEventArgs" /> que está escutando em busca de uma alteração nos dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> from the initialized event.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a assinatura do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.CorrelationToken" /> do evento inicializado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> or <paramref name="dataChangeListener" /> are null references (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> ou <paramref name="dataChangeListener" /> são referências nulas (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).
